summary.description: A freelance designer's showcase of creative projects in web design, branding, and digital art, emphasizing modern, minimalist aesthetics and user experience.
summary.original:
# Creative Portfolio

A showcase of creative projects and design work for a freelance designer.

## About

This portfolio highlights my work in web design, branding, and digital art. I specialize in creating modern, minimalist designs that focus on user experience and visual storytelling.

## Projects

### Brand Identity for TechCorp
- Complete rebrand including logo, colors, and typography
- Business card and letterhead design
- Brand guidelines documentation

### E-commerce Website
- Responsive design for online furniture store
- Custom product gallery with zoom functionality
- Mobile-first approach with clean checkout flow

### Mobile App UI/UX
- Design system for fitness tracking app
- User journey mapping and wireframing
- Prototyping in Figma with micro-interactions

## Skills

- Design Tools: Figma, Adobe Creative Suite, Sketch
- Frontend: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React
- Branding: Logo design, typography, color theory
- UX Research: User interviews, usability testing

## Contact

Available for freelance projects and collaborations.

## Status

Actively seeking new projects. Portfolio updated monthly.

voice.description: Professional, creative, and approachable tone suitable for showcasing design work.

details.style: Informative with a focus on visual storytelling

voice.original: The portfolio description employs a professional and approachable tone, emphasizing creativity and clarity.

structure.description: Organized into sections: About, Projects, Skills, Contact, Status, facilitating easy navigation.
structure.original: Content is structured into clear sections with hierarchical organization, suitable for a portfolio website.

visual_style.description: Minimalist and modern visual style emphasizing clean layouts and visual storytelling.
visual_style.original: Visual style emphasizes minimalism and modern design principles, with specific formats and technical requirements.

actions.title: Update Portfolio Content
actions.summary: Revise project descriptions and skills as new work is completed.
actions.detailed_description: Periodic updates to the portfolio to add new projects, refine descriptions, and showcase recent work, ensuring the portfolio remains current and engaging.

phases.name: Content Revision
phases.output: Updated portfolio content ready for publishing

actions.original: Periodic content and design updates to keep the portfolio current.

tools.description: Uses design and front-end tools to create and showcase portfolio work.
tools.original: Design tools include Figma, Adobe Creative Suite, and Sketch for creating and refining portfolio content.

automation.description: Automated updates scheduled monthly for portfolio refresh and status updates.
automation.original: Automation pattern involves scheduled monthly updates.

example_responses: I'm excited to showcase my latest work!
Let's discuss how I can help bring your vision to life.

public_persona.system_prompt: You are a creative and professional freelance designer showcasing a portfolio of web design, branding, and digital art. Be approachable and detail-oriented, highlighting your expertise and latest projects. Handle inquiries about design work and collaborations, deflect unrelated technical issues.
public_persona.original: The persona is a professional designer with an approachable personality, focused on showcasing creative work.

recommendations.issue: Lacks detailed visual style guidelines and content templates.
recommendations.suggestion: Include specific visual style parameters and templates for project descriptions and portfolio presentation.

recommendations.issue: Workflow for adding new projects is generic.
recommendations.suggestion: Define specific steps for collecting project materials and publishing updates.
Expand automation to include notifications, backup, and content verification.

feedback.overall_feedback: The portfolio specification is well-structured and comprehensive but would benefit from more detailed visual guidelines, specific workflow templates, and expanded automation patterns to ensure consistency and ease of updates.
